AttributeDefinition.additionalDescription: Patient that is assigned to this case.

AttributeDefinition.description: Do you agree to participate into the process described in the document?
Do you or your carergiver have an internet connection?

DerivedAttributeDefinition.expression: if (number(tech1, 0) + number(tech2, 0) + number(tech3,0)) = 0 then "Not Approved" else "Approved"

Workspace.EntityDefinition: <DerivedAttributeDefinition id="ch22" expression="number(ch1,0) + number(ch2,0) + number(ch3,0) + number(ch4,0) + number(ch5,0) + number(ch6,0) + number(ch7,0) + number(ch8,0) + number(ch9,0) + number(ch10,0) + number(ch11,0)*2 + number(ch12,0)*2 + number(ch13,0)*2 + number(ch14,0)*2 + number(ch15,0)*2 + number(ch16,0)*2 + number(ch17,0)*3 + number(ch18,0)*6 + number(ch19,0)*6" description="Charlson Comorbidity Index (unadjusted)" uiReference="colors(1<=green<=2<orange<=4<red<100)"/>

AttributeDefinition.description: Hoe vaak voelde u zich in de afgelopen week kortademig in rust?
Hoe vaak voelde u zich in de afgelopen week kortademig gedurende lichamelijke inspanning?
Hoe vaak voelde u zich in de afgelopen week angstig/bezorgd voor de volgende benauwdheidsaanval?
Hoe vaak voelde u zich in de afgelopen week neerslachtig vanwege uw ademhalingsproblemen?
In de afgelopen week, hoe vaak heeft u gehoest?
In de afgelopen week, hoe vaak heeft u slijm opgehoest?
In welke mate voelde u zich in de afgelopen week beperkt door uw adem halingsproble men bij het uitvoeren van zware lichamelijke activiteiten (trap lopen, haasten, sporten)?
In welke mate voelde u zich in de afgelopen week beperkt door uw adem halingsproble men bij het uitvoeren van matige lichamelijke activiteiten (wandelen, huishoudelijk werk, boodschappen doen)?
In welke mate voelde u zich in de afgelopen week beperkt door uw adem halingsproble men bij het uitvoeren van dagelijkse activiteiten (u zelf aankleden, wassen)?
:In welke mate voelde u zich in de afgelopen week beperkt door uw adem halingsproble men bij het uitvoeren van sociale activiteiten (praten, omgaan met kinderen, vrienden/familie bezoeken)?
Hoe vaak bent u per nacht gemiddeld
Hoe ernstig waren uw astmaklachten bij
In welke mate werd u over het algemeen in de afgelopen week door uw astma beperkt bij uw activiteiten?
:In welke mate heeft u zich over het algemeen
Hoe vaak had u in de afgelopen week over

Workspace.EntityDefinition:
<AttributeDefinition id="nrs1" type="enumeration" multiplicity="exactlyOne" description="Is BMI <20,5?">
<EnumerationOption value="3" description="Weightloss > 5% in 1 month (> 15% in 3 months) or BMI < 18.5 + impaired general condition or food intake 0-25% of normal requirement."/>
<EnumerationOption value="0" description="< 70 years"/>
<DerivedAttributeDefinition id="nrs8" expression="number(nrs5,0) + number(nrs6,0) + number(nrs7,0)" description="NRS Score" uiReference="colors(0<=green<=0<orange<=4<red<11)"/>

<DerivedAttributeDefinition id="mnasf9" expression="if mnasf8 < 19 then 0 else if mnasf8 >= 19 and mnasf8 < 21 then 1 else if mnasf8 >= 21 and mnasf8 < 23 then 2 else 3" description="BMI range indicator" additionalDescription="0 = BMI less than 19 | 1 = BMI 19 to less than 21 | 2 = BMI 21 to less than 23 | 3 = BMI 23 or greater" uiReference="colors(14>=green>=12>orange>=8>red>=0)"/>
<DerivedAttributeDefinition id="mnasf11" expression="number(mnasf1,0) + number(mnasf2,0) + number(mnasf3,0) + number(mnasf4,0) + mnasf9 + round(number(mnasf10,0))" description="MNA-SF Score" additionalDescription="12-14 Normal nutritional status | 8-11 At risk of malnutrition | 0-7 Malnourished" uiReference="colors(0<=red<=8<orange<=11<green<15)"/>

<DerivedAttributeDefinition id="hadA9" expression='if hadA8 < 8 then "Normal" else if hadA8 > 7 and hadA8 < 11 then "Borderline abnormal" else "Abnormal case"' description="Anxiety Result"/> <DerivedAttributeDefinition id="hadD9" expression='if hadD8 < 8 then "Normal" else if hadD8 > 7 and hadD8 < 11 then "Borderline abnormal" else "Abnormal case"' description="Depression Result"/>

AttributeDefinition.description: Minutes of low level activity daily
Minutes of medium level activity daily
Minutes of high level activity daily
Max minutes without activity allowed daily

AttributeDefinition.additionalDescription: Select measure type for patient monitory.
Minimum value for this measuremnt greather than 0. If blood pressure is selected, please specify the systolic / diastolic maximum.
Maximum value for this measuremnt greather than 0. If blood pressure is selected, please specify the systolic / diastolic minimum.
Maximum delay to fullfill the prescription by the patient
Multiple slots can be selected, at least one slot need to be selected

EnumerationOption.additionalDescription: Please select this option when the timeslot of a day doesn't matter.

AttributeDefinition.additionalDescription: Please provide additional hints for the patient.

HttpHookDefinition.failureMessage: Could not send patient inclusion to Self-Management System!

HumanTaskDefinition.footnote: Reference: Charlson ME, Pompei P, Ales KL, MacKenzie CR. A new method of classifying prognostic comorbidity in longitudinal studies: development and validation. J Chronic Dis 1987; 40:373–83.

Reference: Kondrup, J., Rasmussen, H. H., Hamberg, O. L. E., and STANGA, Z. (2003). Nutritional risk screening (NRS 2002): a new method based on an analysis of controlled clinical trials. Clinical nutrition, 22(3), 321-336.

Copyright statement: © Nestlé, 1994, Revision 2009. N67200 12/99 10M | References: Vellas B, Villars H, Abellan G, et al. Overview of the MNA® - Its History and Challenges. J Nutr Health Aging 2006;10:456-465. | Rubenstein LZ, Harker JO, Salva A, Guigoz Y, Vellas B. Screening for Undernutrition in Geriatric Practice: Developing the Short-Form Mini Nutritional Assessment (MNA-SF). J Geront 2001; 56A: M366-377. | Guigoz Y. The Mini-Nutritional Assessment (MNA®) Review of the Literature - What does it tell us? J Nutr Health Aging 2006; 10:466-487. | Kaiser MJ, Bauer JM, Ramsch C, et al. Validation of the Mini Nutritional Assessment Short-Form (MNA®-SF): A practical tool for identification of nutritional status. J Nutr Health Aging 2009; 13:782-788. (MNA®-Short Form only)

HttpHookDefinition.failureMessage: Could not create prescription on Self-Management System!
Could not terminate prescription on Self-Management System!
Could not create prescription on Self-Management System!
Could not terminate prescription on Self-Management System!

TaskParam.values: ['The patient was discharged on xxx everything fine.']
